name: Travelling home for Christmas
description:
Can you find your way home across the metro system?  The good news is it's Christmas eve and the mayor has decreed all trains will run express today which means they only stop every third station. That should save some time! Or will it?

  • Number of puzzles: 1
  • Average play time: 5 minutes
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.
  • Hackable source:  click here

Part of the 2022 Confounding Calendar:  https://confoundingcalendar.itch.io/
Palette courtesy of: https://lospec.com/palette-list/island-life

puzzlescript implementation - Andrea Gilbert - 2022   
puzzle concept and design - Andrea Gilbert - 2009
